item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Primary Typeface:Rubik Usage Rules The primary typeface is for use in all contexts outside of the logo and its variations, including web, social media, and print graphics "Thin" weight should only be used at large sizes Occasional use of all caps to delineate titling is ideal If background is not white, use white type as much as possible Avoid using colored type on colored backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Rubik Italic 200 Light Rubik Italic 400 Regular Rubik Italic 600 Medium Rubik Italic 800 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?

item.title: Variations
item.description: Variations On The Logo Usage Rules Variations are designed for products and services to fit within the InfluxData brand Logo Variations follow the same rules specified for the main logo

item.title: Logo DOs & DONT's
item.description: Logo DOs & DON'Ts Usage Rules Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.) Never reveal the bounding box around the logo or symbol If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is simple Example 1 Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background.

item.title: Secondary Typeface (Code)
item.description: Secondary Typeface (Code):Roboto Mono Usage Rules The secondary typeface (Code) is only for use in code samples Use Regular weight for light backgrounds Use Bold weight for dark backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 700 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?​‌’​‌“​‌!​‌”​‌(​‌%​‌)​‌[​‌#​‌]​‌{​‌@​‌}​‌/​‌&​‌​‌®​‌©​‌$​‌€​‌£​‌¥​‌¢​‌:​‌;​‌,​‌.​‌* Example Paragraph VHS messenger bag craft beer food truck. item.title: Anatomy
item.description: Anatomy of The Logo Usage Rules Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol The Symbol: Cuboctahedron Symbol + Logotype

item.title: InfluxData Brand Colors
item.description: InfluxData Brand Colors The Offical Brand Colors are intended for all use cases. It is effective for UI, marketing graphics, and everything in between. Usage Rules Do not use colors outside of these colors Never use true black #000000 Primary Colors Deep Purple P0 #1F0A23 Pool P1 #22ADF6 White P2 #FFFFFF Secondary Colors Chartreuse S0 #D6F622 Magenta S1 #BF2FE5 Comet S2 #9394FF Nuetrals There are many nuetrals because they are the most used.

item.title: Secondary Typeface
item.description: Secondary Typeface:Roboto Sans Usage Rules The secondary typeface is for use in all contexts outside of the logo and its variations, including web, social media, and print graphics "Thin" weight should only be used at large sizes Occasional use of all caps to delineate titling is ideal If background is not white, use white type as much as possible Avoid using colored type on colored backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 100 Thin Roboto 300 Light Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 500 Medium Roboto 700 Bold Roboto 900 Black Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?

item.title: Story
item.description: How The Cuboctahedron Came To Be: The Story Of Our Visual Journey From InfluxDB to InfluxData What began as InfluxDB will become InfluxData; going from product to platform. InfluxDB will become one of four products known collectively as the "TICK Stack". This transition of the company is the inception our efforts. Our goals:We want the logo to feel like a platform while maintaining its own unique identity.

item.title: Company Profile
item.description: Company Profile InfluxData in 100 Words InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the open source time series database. Our technology is purpose-built to handle the massive volumes of time-stamped data produced by IoT devices, applications, networks, containers and computers. We are on a mission to help developers and organizations, such as Cisco, IBM, PayPal, and Tesla, store and analyze real-time data, empowering them to build transformative monitoring, analytics, and IoT applications quicker and to scale.

item.title: Hero Graphics
item.description: Hero Graphics Usage Rules All Hero Graphics should incorporate each of these three elements: Data + Time + Action The following options for each element are available to use in your compositions Data Data can be conceptual in the form of dimensional diagrams, or more literal representations of the various industries we serve and the types of data they generate Time A layer of time must be overlaid on top of our data layer; this can come in the form of timelines, stopwatch dials, radars, or equalizers

item.title: Mascots
item.description: InfluxData Mascots We make use of animal mascots to add more personality to the brand. They are not the official representations of our products or The TICK Stack as a whole. The mascots are primarily used in promotional material such as stickers and merchandise. Each product has an associated animal that uses the same starting character (Except Chronograf). Telegraf Tiger InfluxDB I'iwi Chronograf Giraffe Kapacitor Koala Outreach Club Octopus Downloads Color + Transparent Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-24 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-24 400x295 Chronograf PNG-24 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-24 280x380 Outreach PNG-24 249x400 Color + White Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-8 / JPG 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-8 / JPG 400x295 Chronograf PNG-8 / JPG 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-8 / JPG 280x380 Outreach PNG-8 / JPG 249x400

item.title: Messaging
item.description: Messaging How we talk about about ourselves Values Voice Traits Respect Sincere Humility Plain-spoken Action Inspirational Courage Brave Openness Direct What We Say Tagline Act in Time We will use this in some logo treatments and advertising campaigns as a way of describing what we do.

item.title: Platform
item.description: Brand Platform Core Passion Simplicity From the moment someone sets up InfluxDB to the moment their time series data begins appearing, the magic of our product is that it is drop-dead simple. Everything we do and everything we say should reflect our commitment to making things as simple as possible. We have tried to embrace passion in our visual identity and writing style – the website is flatter, the navigation simplified, the images simplified; everything more simple and consistent.
